messages.title: LET'S MAKE WESTMINSTER WORK FOR SCOTLAND & STIRLING
messages.content: An SNP MP working for communities across the Stirling area against fracking. Support renewal work of the Scottish government in protecting the environment.

messages.title: MAKE SURE WESTMINSTER CAN'T TAKE SCOTLAND FOR GRANTED
messages.content: Vote to end cruel welfare sanctions. Oppose spending £100 billion on new Nuclear Weapons. Oppose further austerity cuts which impact the poor. Work in the interests of their constituents, always putting Scotland's interests first.

messages.title: STANDING UP FOR SCOTLAND – AND DELIVERING THE NEW POWERS WE NEED
messages.content: Plan to give Scotland the power to create jobs, build a fairer society and deliver new welfare changes.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Supports the position against fracking in the Stirling area.
Backs plans for more free childcare and protection for NHS spending.
Seeks to reject austerity and stop Labour from taking Scotland for granted.
Supports delivering new powers to the Scottish Parliament to create jobs, boost prosperity, deliver fairer tax, families and the elderly, and tackle where changes.

issues.environment: Support renewal work of the Scottish government in protecting the environment.
issues.health: Back our plans for more free childcare and protection for NHS spending.
issues.socialWelfare: Vote to end cruel welfare sanctions.

leaflet.personalStatement: I was born in Stirling and grew up in Cambusbarron, where I still live.

politicalExperience.achievements: Elected as a Councillor for the Stirling East Ward on Stirling Council.

quotes.text: “Scotland voted No hoping for new powers - now we'll vote SNP to secure them”
“We’re voting SNP at the general election because only they can shake the SNP out Scotland First”
“I’ve voted SNP for the Scottish Parliament elections now I’m voting SNP for Westminster too”

images.caption: Photo of Steven Paterson with local MSPs Keith Brown & Bruce Crawford
Photo of Steven Paterson with Nicola Sturgeon
